attacks.name: Quick Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 different types of basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Dragon Spark
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance to Benched Pokémon.)
